title: Mohamed Atmani
text: Mohamed Atmani (born 30 June 1937) is a Moroccan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1960 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Viljo%20Aho">Viljo Aho</a> of Finland.
